Question: Quectel Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Quectel Wireless Solutions Co., Ltd.

Product: Quectel FGE576Q and FGE573Q Wi-Fi 7 Modules

- Represents a significant leap forward in Wi-Fi technology, harnessing the power of the latest Wi-Fi 7 standard to provide faster speeds, increased capacity, and improved efficiency
- FGE576Q boasts an impressive data rate of up to 3.6Gbps, while the FGE573Q supports up to 2.9Gbps
- Operating on dual bands simultaneously—2.4GHz + 5GHz and 2.4GHz + 6GHz— the FGE576Q offers ultra-low latency, ensuring real-time responsiveness
- Both modules support LE audio and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), featuring a maximum data rate of 2 Mbps and BLE Long Range capabilities
- Feature Multi-Link Operation (MLO) empowering routers to utilize multiple wireless bands and channels concurrently when connecting to a Wi-Fi 7 client
- Ideal solutions for various applications, including cloud gaming, 8K A/V streaming, AR/VR, industrial IoT, and telemedicine
- Incorporate state-of-the-art features such as WPA3 encryption for data confidentiality and integrity
- Compact design facilitates seamless integration into a diverse array of devices
